work.name: Google
work.summary: Designed algorithms that parallelize SPICE simulation while pruning unnecessary input patterns to improve in-house timer performance.

work.name: Intel
work.summary: Utilized a constraint analyzer to automate FPGA designs debugging.

publications.name: PathGen: An Efficient Parallel Critical Path Generation Algorithm
publications.publisher: IEEE/ACM Asia and South Pacific Design Automation Conference (ASP-DAC)

publications.name: Ink: Efficient Incremental k-Critical Path Generation

projects.name: G-PathGen: An Efficient GPU-parallel Critical Path Generation Algorithm
projects.summary: Designed efficient GPU kernel algorithms for parallel critical path generation and dynamically adjusted the generated path count to maximize GPU utilization while minimizing redundant work.

projects.name: PathGen: An Efficient Parallel Critical Path Generation Algorithm
projects.summary: Designed a multi-level queue scheduler to efficiently schedule parallel exploration of similar-priority paths.

projects.name: Ink: Efficient Incremental k-Critical Path Generation
projects.summary: Designed an algorithm that efficiently identifies a set of paths to reuse for the next query and effectively prunes the path search space.
